abstract: We're inviting students to use one of 25 first lines from The Times Magazine's "Lives" column for creative writing and to share that work on Figment, an online community for young adult readers and writers.

lead_paragraph: We're celebrating Oct. 20, the National Day on Writing, in all kinds of ways, and this is the first.

headline.main: Using Opening Lines From the Magazine's 'Lives' Column as Writing Prompts
